meanings.definition: A type of undergarment worn by women.
meanings.sent1: She bought a new pantie at the store.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite pantie is the lacy one.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally wore her pantie inside out today!
meanings.sent4: The colorful pantie peeked out from her jeans.
meanings.sent5: The silky pantie felt smooth against her skin.

meanings.definition: A single unit of the undergarment worn on each leg.
meanings.sent1: She picked up a pink pantie from the laundry basket.
meanings.sent2: The pantie on the left leg had a small tear.
meanings.sent3: She found her cat playing with her pantie like a toy!
meanings.sent4: The pantie dangled from the clothesline in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: She always wears a clean pantie every day.
